title: The Bloomsday Dead
description: Attending to his usual challenges as the head of security for the Miraflores Hilton in Lima, Michael Forsythe receives an impassioned summons from a dangerous ex-lover, Bridget, who threatens Michael's life if he fails to rescue her kidnapped daughter. By the author of Dead I Well May Be. 20,000 first printing.
author: Adrian McKinty
